name: Pixel Perfect 2
description:
=======================================================

PIXEL PERFECT 2 (Prototype)

A local co-op platforms game prototype made by LOS Games as part of a college assignment.

Try to beat the level while co-operating to your partner on 2 different roles, and dealing with the trippy synthwave aesthetic.

=======================================================

CONTROLS

PRESS 5 TO RESTART LEVEL.

JUMPER: (Controlled with a Controller)

A: Jump

Left Joystick: Air Movement

Right Joystick: Camera Movement

CATCHER: (Controlled with Keyboard and Mouse)

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Camera Movement

R: Transformation

REMEMBER: You will move faster towards the direction your camera is looking at.

=========================================================

Any Feedback will be much appreciated.

WARNING: Currently the game is dealing with a gameplay bug thus being unable to restart the level without restarting the game. We'll fix as soon as we figure out the problem.  FIXED

==========================================================

CREDITS:

Game Design: Steven Kormanik, Omar Rodríguez

Level Design & Scripting: Luis Martínez

Original game idea (Pixel perfect 1.0): Amadeo Delgado y Luis Martínez.

Special thanks: Fas3 Estudios, Lara Sánchez , Amadeo Delgado, Borja Parrondo.

Original Background and Banner Art: https://wall.alphacoders.com/big.php?i=843675

===========================================================

UPDATE BUILD 1.1:

Fixed the restart bug, you can now restart the game pressing 5 on your keyboard, excuse us for the bad key, we are working on it... surely.

From Inverted to normal: Half way through the disaster our scripting is, I forgot that negative means inverted, and the normal controls for JUMPER were inverted. My bad.

============================================================

UPDATE BUILD 1.3:

Added Chronometer to the game for levels.

Added 4 more levels (Total of 3)

Updated menu

Updated Interlevel system

Updated win condition

===============================================================

UPDATE BUILD 1.4:

No more sticky balls: No more bugs where you lose control if your mate swaps forms while you haven't jumped. We increased the accurate of the way the game detects if you are on the air, or on top of your partner.

===============================================================

UPDATE BUILD 1.5

I can see better: Better camera angle for the catcher to be more aware of it's surroundings.

Floppy Sound: Fixed an issue letting you spawn the charging sound. It has been removed, although you can still spam the bounce sound til your hearts content. This is not a bug.

I know I'm dead: Added a simple death screen. Remember, if you touch the floor, you die.

Cute Particles: Added some particles on impact (CREDIT: Amadeo Delgado Casado).
